mapper.select: SELECT FILENAME, FILEREALNAME FROM UPLOAD WHERE 1=1
SELECT distinct sd_cd, sd_nm, ST_X(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_Centroid(geom), 4326)) AS sd_lon, ST_Y(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_Centroid(geom), 4326)) AS sd_lat FROM tl_sd ORDER BY sd_nm ASC

SELECT distinct b.sgg_cd, b.sgg_nm, ST_X(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_Centroid(b.geom), 4326)) AS sgg_lon, ST_Y(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_Centroid(b.geom), 4326)) AS sgg_lat FROM tl_sd a JOIN tl_sgg b ON a.sd_nm = b.sd_nm WHERE a.sd_cd = #{sido} ORDER BY b.sgg_nm ASC

SELECT distinct b.bjd_cd, b.bjd_nm, ST_X(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_Centroid(b.geom), 4326)) AS bjd_lon, ST_Y(ST_TRANSFORM(ST_Centroid(b.geom), 4326)) AS bjd_lat FROM tl_bjd b JOIN tl_sgg a ON a.sgg_cd = b.sgg_cd WHERE a.sgg_cd = #{sgg} ORDER BY b.bjd_nm ASC
